name: Princess Chessboard
description:
A casual light strategy card-building adventure with dice as weapons.
As a warrior in the animal kingdom, use your wisdom to defeat your opponents along the way and find and bring back the runaway princess! On the way, you need to maximize your earnings as much as possible and choose different strategies according to your next destination.

Gameplay
You will set off on your journey to find the princess with your initial dice, choosing different routes and acquiring suitable resources - your goal is to move to the right square with your dice to get the effect and ultimately defeat your opponent. Along the way, you can exchange resources between warriors at specific locations and make yourself go further on the road to finding the princess.
